div.p: Examples of model species utilized in research on genetic underpinnings of climate change responses. (A) The great tit ( Parus major), (B) red-billed gull ( Larus novaehollandiae), (C) red squirrel ( Tamiasciurus hudsonicus), (D) pink salmon ( Oncorhynchus gorbuscha), (E) grove snail ( Cepaea nemoralis) and (F) field mustard ( Brassica rapa). Photograph credit: (A): S. Caro, (B): J. Meril√§, (C): C. Kolacz, (D): A. P. Hendry, (E): M. Ozgo, (F): S. Franks.
